column4: Any brave soul here get Dapper working with a Dual Monitor setup?
It's no different than any other dual monitor setup in Linux.
I beg to differ... had it working perfectly under warty, hoary, and breezy, but Dapper freezes my machine solid when I try to start X with a second screen setup.
Sounds like a bug then. If you know how to do it in 1 version, stands to reason that you're intelligent enough to make it work again in a newer one.
